short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adding custom request headers with every request!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to add custom request headers with every request you make.
It can be useful for debugging purposes.

The custom headers are defined in JSON, for example:
[
    {"name": "my-custom-header", "value": "123"}
]

All of your custom headers are stored in the browser storage.
After you set your custom headers, please restart the browser!
